title: HONORS LVL BUG?
body:
I reached level 3 in honors but got no capsule, also I didn't receive a loading screen ribbon. 

Did they take theses things away, or is this a bug?

replies.body:
Ayyyyy congrats on Honor rank 3!! 

So about the loading screen flairs first: in order to get those to appear you first need to be honored by 2 premade teammates or 1 random teammate. After that, you'll then have a loading screen flair on the next loading screen. 

Honor Capsules have a *chance* to drop after matches once you're rank 3, similar to key fragments.
But if you hit your max key fragments for the month (12 right?) you no longer have a chance to get the capsules?  Cause the honor update page said we are not getting any more fragments then before.

You can still get Honor Capsules even if you've reached your key fragment limit! You'll still get the 2 frags from the capsule AFAIK.

**EDIT**: I've been informed this is in fact incorrect. Devs are currently in progress of updating the [**Honor FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148) with the correct information, and once done we can refer to that for all Honor details
What is the drop rate for capsules?  I've been Honor 3 for almost 3 weeks now and haven't gotten any... something seems screwy.

Capsules drops like key fragments, you will get it eventually by playing games, and that loading screen ribbon, you need to get honored by at least two premades and one ally so next game in loading screen you will get it in loading screen so everyone else can see that you are coming from a great game.
